oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Confidence comes with time and the time is now!
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hilton, W. Mark
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: confidence
goals
consultation
trust
mentor
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A lack of confidence is a common concern among recent veterinary graduates. We as professionals can build our confidence through practice, asking questions, discovering more about the clientâ€™s business, and asking their goals. All of these things add to the building of trust between doctor and client. As trust grows, our confidence grows.
